name: Love is Blind #BrackeysGameJam
description:
Side scrolling Platformer with multiple levels. You play in complete darkness and have to find a way to your heart. There are mechanics in the levels that require your input in order to complete the level.

Only had half the time to make it and i am going to try to fully complete it past the Game Jam as i have started to like the concept and want to expand in it.
